item.description:
Science Shaping Our World-SHOW: Deconstructing the Drug Development Process: New Paradigms for Pharmaceutical Innovation

When: Thursday, June 7, 2012 | 6:00 pm - 9:00 pm

Where: TMEC Walter Amphitheater, Harvard Medical School, 260 Longwood Ave, Boston, Massachusetts 02115.

Learn more and register on the http://showjune2012.eventbrite.com/.

Â 

June's SHOW will examine the drug development process and highlight new paradigms for pharmaceutical innovation. The industry has been undergoing a transformation from fully-integrated pharmaceutical companies (FIPCos) to a network model (FIPNet) that encompasses all the major stakeholders in drug development. Our special guest speaker Dr. Kenneth Kaitin will discuss these and other major shifts within the pharmaceutical industry.
item.name: New Paradigms for Pharmaceutical Innovation
